altTitles.en: Behind the Laughter of the Surviving Princess

description.en:
"Very good. I shall give you my beloved sister, whom I cherish dearly."

Eric Chladnie, who led the long war to victory against the Shidate Principality, received the mandate to marry a foolish princess as a reward for his triumph.

After the wedding ceremony, Eric returned to the mansion with the newlywed princess. Amidst the princess's eccentric behaviour, his father attempts to kill her and his mother advices him to not give his heart. Only he, treating her like a child, respects and cherishes her as his wife. However, who is this woman who, in front of the king, impersonates deeds that she has never done and acts piously?

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.ja: あかいろ交差点

description.en:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
description.es: El timido y amigable Keita trata de mejorar su amistad con Tamaki, que siempre se ha mostrado fria y cruel desde la primera vez que se conocieron. ¿Pero por qué? Keita quiere saber… ¿Será que lo odia? ¿Hizo algo que la lastimó? Eso pensaba Keita, hasta que Tamaki le dijo que podia ver algo especial…

"Hello fellow citizens. I am Yoshida the half-elf, working for the post office of the Imperial City of Idazig. My job is to deliver letters and documents to wherever you need them to be, whether it be a castle in the sky or the bottom of an abyss."

This is a comedy written by the biggest Middle-Ages geek, hitting the fantasy genre from an entirely new angle!

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

description.ar:
أخيرًا ، كانت ليلتهم الأولى. همست ليتيسيا ، مائلة جبهتها على صدره. "كما هو متوقع ، هل هو بعيد جدًا؟ هل يجب أن أقترب؟ " الحمية بالكاد ابتلع تأوه. كانت يده التي تمسك بكتف ليتيسيا ترتعش بدهشة حلوة ، لكنها لم تنتبه. "أعلم أنك غير مرتاح. لكن من فضلك تحملني حتى تأتي أمي ". الحمية يكره ليتيسيا. كان من الطبيعي أن قتلت والدة ليتيسيا عائلته. لم تشك أبدا في الحقيقة. لذلك لم تكن تعرف مدى سوء تشويه وجهه بكلماتها. "عليك فقط أن تتحملني لمدة نصف عام. ثم سأطلقك كما يحلو لك ". عند كلمة "طلاق" ، صر أسنانه.

description.en:
Finally, it was their first night.

Leticia whispered, leaning her forehead against his chest, "As expected, is it too far? Should I get closer?"

Dietrian barely swallowed a groan. His hand grasping Leticia's shoulder was shaking with a sweet faze, but she didn't notice.

"I know that you're uncomfortable. But please bear with me until my mother comes."

Dietrian hated Leticia. It was natural as Leticia's mother killed his family. She had never doubted the fact. So she didn't know, how badly his face was distorted by her words.

"You just have to put up with me for half a year. Then, I will divorce you as you wish."

At the word 'divorce,' he grit his teeth.

---
Despite being the daughter of the Holy Empire’s most revered divine leader, Leticia is rumored to be a ruthless, bloodthirsty tyrant. The thing is… none of the rumors are true! After years of living as her vindictive mother’s scapegoat, Leticia is ultimately cursed to die if she doesn’t kill her beloved husband, King Ditrian, with her own two hands. But when the clock miraculously resets to mere days before their wedding, she gets a second chance to save not only Ditrian, but his entire kingdom. This time, will the world recognize the real Leticia before it’s too late, or is history doomed to repeat itself?

description.es:
Me vi obligada a casarme con un hombre que me odia. Lo cual era de esperar ya que mi madre mató a su familia.

"Quiero que me lo prometas antes de casarnos. Después de 6 meses de matrimonio, quiero que te divorcies de mí."

"...¿Qué?" "Sé que te obligaron a casarte conmigo. No necesitamos prolongar un matrimonio no deseado, ¿verdad?"

"¿Un... matrimonio no deseado?"

Aturdido siguió repitiendo mis palabras.

description.fr:
Fille de la Sainte de l’Empire, elle a passé sa vie brimée par sa mère qui l’accuse de lui voler ses pouvoirs. Pour se débarrasser de sa fille, la Sainte la force à se marier au dirigeant de la principauté voisine, dont elle souhaite la destruction. Son plan: faire de sa fille la malédiction qui détruira la lignée de ses ennemis. Mais cette dernière, qui a finalement trouvé l'amour avec son mari, est anéantie par sa mort. Faisant appel à la déesse, elle obtient une seconde chance et retourne dans le passé, juste avant son mariage. Elle va pouvoir changer le futur!

description.id:
Akhirnya, itu adalah malam pertama mereka. Leticia berbisik, menyandarkan dahinya ke dadanya. "Seperti yang diharapkan, apakah terlalu jauh? Haruskah aku mendekat?" Dietrian hampir tidak menelan erangan. Tangannya menggenggam bahu Leticia gemetar dengan faze manis, tapi dia tidak memperhatikan. "Aku tahu kau tidak nyaman. Tapi tolong bersabarlah denganku sampai ibuku datang." Dietrian membenci Leticia. Itu wajar karena ibu Leticia membunuh keluarganya. Dia tidak pernah meragukan faktanya. Jadi dia tidak tahu, betapa buruk wajahnya terdistorsi oleh kata-katanya. "Anda hanya perlu bertahan dengan saya selama setengah tahun. Kemudian, aku akan menceraikanmu seperti yang kamu inginkan." Pada kata 'perceraian', dia mengertakkan giginya.

---

description.ko:
나를 증오하는 남자와 결혼하게 되었다.
나의 어머니가 그의 가족들을 죽였으니, 당연한 일이었다.

“결혼 전에 꼭 약속해 주셨으면 하는 게 있어요
반년 후엔, 이혼해 주셨으면 해요.”

“……네?”

“억지로 하는 결혼이잖아요. 원치 않는 결혼을 굳이 이어 갈 필요 없다고 생각해요.”

“원치 않는, 결혼이요.”

그는 멍하니 나의 말을 반복했다.

description.pt:
Fui forçada a casar com um homem que me odeia. O que era de se esperar, já que minha mãe matou sua família.

“Eu quero que você me prometa antes de nos casarmos. Após 6 meses de casamento, quero que você se divorcie de mim.”

“…O quê?”

“Eu sei que você foi forçado a se casar comigo. Não precisamos prolongar um casamento indesejado, precisamos?”

“Casamento… indesejado?”

Ele atordoado continuou repetindo minhas palavras.

description.ru:
Я стала женой мужчины, который меня ненавидит, поскольку моя мать убила всю его семью. Очевидно, что в этом нет ничего удивительного. Перед тем, как мы поженимся, я хочу чтобы вы мне кое-что пообещали – мы расстанемся через полгода. Это принудительный брак. Не думаю, что есть смысл быть вместе далее. Но будет ли так на самом деле?

description.uk:
Про Латицію – доньку Святої, найбільш шанованої лідерки церкви в імперії, ширяться чутки, немов дівчина безжальна й кровожерна тиранка. Але насправді… Усе це – нісенітниці! Роками живучи роллю цапа-відбувайла задля своєї мстивої матері, врешті-решт Латиції судилося померти, якщо вона відмовиться власноруч убити свого коханого, короля Дітріана. Але коли магічним чином час повернувся до моменту їхнього одруження. Латиція отримала другий шанс врятувати не лише Дітріана, але й усе його королівство. Чи дізнається світ цього разу про справжню Латицію, перш ніж стане занадто пізно, чи історія приречена знову повторитися?

description.zh:
我与憎恨着我的男人结婚了。 我的母亲将他的家族抹杀，他恨我也是理所当然的。 “结婚前希望您能答应我一件事。半年后，请与我离婚。” “……什么？” “反正是勉强结的婚不是吗。我觉得没必要延续勉强的婚姻。” “勉强的，婚姻。” 他茫然地重复着我的话。

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.

title.en: It's My First Time Being Loved

altTitles.en: First Time as a Loved Youngest Child
First Time as an Adored Youngest Child

altTitles.zh: 第一次成为受宠的老幺

altTitles.es-la: Es la primera vez que me aman

description.en:
As the only hope to stop the end of the world, I’ve lived 99 lives with everyone pressuring me to sacrifice myself. I dearly hoped this life would be my last…!

“A lady is born!”

I’ve ended up beginning my 100th life. They’re going to give me a hero treatment and sacrifice me again anyways. Is what I thought, but—

“Thank you for being born safely.”
“Unnie’s gon to get dem all for you!”
“Can I please see our youngest smiling as well?”
“Hey little baby, did you miss me?”

This life is a bit… weird.
description.es-la: Como la única esperanza para evitar la destrucción del mundo, esta es la 99ª vez que me veo obligada a sacrificarme. ¡Realmente esperaba que este fuera el final...! ‘¡Ha nacido una niña!’ Y así, comienza mi vida número 100. Nuevamente, me harán ser una heroína para sacrificarme, eso fue lo que pensé.  ‘Gracias por nacer a salvo.’ ‘De ahora en adelante, ¡yo té protegeré!’ ‘¿Puedes mostrarme tu rostro sonriente?’ ‘Cariño, ¿me extrañaste?’ Esta vida es un poco... ¿Rara?

altTitles.ja: 化物語

description.en:
Koyomi Araragi, a third-year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain. Regardless, Araragi tries to live the life of a normal student, with the help of his friend and the class president, Tsubasa Hanekawa. When fellow classmate Hitagi Senjougahara falls down the stairs and is caught by Araragi, the boy realizes that the girl is unnaturally weightless. Despite Senjougahara's protests, Araragi insists he help her, deciding to enlist the aid of Oshino, the very man who had once helped him with his own predicament. Through several tales involving demons and gods, Bakemonogatari follows Araragi as he attempts to help those who suffer from supernatural maladies.

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2219-bakemonogatari?utm_source=mgd)
description.ru: Арараги Коёми — с виду самый обычный школьник — однажды поднимался по лестнице. Неожиданно на него сверху падает его одноклассница, Хитаги Сэндзёгахара — молчаливая и нелюдимая. Уже было подставив руки, паренек приготовился упасть вместе с девушкой, но та оказалась не тяжелее школьного учебника… Через какое-то время Коёми понял: несмотря на образ, который сложился за долгое время, Сэндзёгахара молчит совсем не из-за скромности! Больно крутой и дерзкий характер у нее оказался. А ещё она легко и быстро достает буквально из воздуха острые предметы — школьные канцтовары. Но и сам Арараги оказался не слишком прост. Он рассказал, что сам до недавнего времени был вампиром, и выручил его один знакомый — Мэмэ Ошино. Не поймешь, святой или просто старый хиппи… Он объяснил: над Хитаги кто-то подшутил. И этот кто-то — бог. Ну, а что делать обычному герою? Помогать девушкам в беде, конечно же! А их таких о-очень много…
description.pt-br: Koyomi Araragi, um estudante do terceiro ano, que é quase humano novamente depois de se tornar por um breve período um vampiro. Um dia, uma colega de classe chamada Hitagi Senjogahara, que vergonhosamente nunca fala com ninguém, cai da escada nos braços de Koyomi. Ele descobre que Hitagi não possui peso nenhum, um desafio a física. Apesar de ter sido ameaçado por ela, Koyomi oferece sua ajuda, e apresenta a Meme Oshino, um homem sem-teto de meia-idade que o ajudou a deixar de ser um vampiro.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!
They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
description.id: Mereka datang dengan tiga alasan, sekedar menyapamu, menyukaimu, atau ingin mencelakaimu.

altTitles.ja: 伽藍の姫
伽藍の姫 -がらんのひめ-

description.en: A world where machine civilization has perished and immortal monsters called "Monotsuki" are rampant. Isana, a girl born in a remote village, meets a mechanical person who lost her memories and looks exactly like her sister, who should have disappeared in the ruins she wandered into. Convinced that "My sister is alive," Isana gives the mechanical person the name "Hime" (princess) and together they set out on a journey to find her sister.

altTitles.ja: ミックス

description.en:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
description.ja: 舞台は明青学園。同年同月同日に生まれた同い年の兄弟とひとつ違いの妹。上杉兄弟の伝説から２６年、運命の兄弟は今再び明青学園の扉を開く。そして、物語は始まる―――

altTitles.ja: ドラゴン娘のどこでもないゾーン

description.en:
Five dragon girls without an ounce of sense between them. Going nowhere at the breakneck pace of 4 panels per page.

This is the Dragon Girls' Nowhere Zone.

altTitles.ja: ワンフォーオール

description.en:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!

altTitles.ja: ピエロマン

description.en:
Manga artist Toratoki Yamamura's serialized work "Revenge Clown'' has been decided to be made into a movie, and with the support of his beloved wife, he is having the best night in both his professional and private life. However, that was just the beginning of the nightmare that was about to begin...
What is the unexperienced murderous intent called by unconscious malice? ? What is the true identity of the mysterious revenge demon "Clown Man"? ?
Suspense-horror master Shingo Honda collaborates for the first time with Shinsuke Takahashi, a master of writing, to unleash an astonishing and earth-shattering ``wet-clothed'' suspense story! !
That was the boy I loved, accompanying me through verdant days and brilliant, fleeting years.

description.ar:
عرضت أريا عقد زواج. إلى الدوق الاكبر فالنتين الذي قيل أنه باع روحه للشيطان. حتى تتمكن من حماية نفسها ولويد [تزوجني] أعطته أريا مذكرة تطلب يده للزواج بورقة القيقب الصغيرة مثل يديها. [إنه عقد زواج ، لذا سنتطلق بعد 10 سنوات ...] أمسك السيد الشاب بالملاحظة التي كانت آريا تكتبها ومزقها إلى أشلاء. "إذن أين يمكنني ختمها؟" "أخبرتني أنك ستطلقني بمجرد أن نتقدم في السن." كبر الشيطان الصغير وقبل جبهتها. "منذ أن أصبحنا بالغين ، علينا بدلاً من ذلك إبرام عقد للبالغين".

description.cs:
"Ak existuje ďalší život, zachránim ťa." Aria je posledná siréna, netvor, ktorý očaruje ľudí piesňou. Spútaná je nútená spievať šľachticom, až kým nezomrie. Kým ju démonizovaný veľkovojvoda Lloyd Valentine oslobodí, je už neskoro. Už vydýchla naposledy... alebo si to aspoň myslí. Keď sa Aria prebudí v minulosti, zasvätí svoj život ochrane vojvodu, ale rozmýšľa, či je to naozaj všetko, za čo jej krátky život stojí. Bude niekedy slobodná? Alebo je táto siréna predurčená spievať navždy tú istú pieseň?

description.en:
Aria offered a contract marriage. To Grand Duke Valentine who was said to have sold his soul to the devil. So she could protect herself and him.

"Marry me."

Aria passed him a note which asked for his hand in marriage with her little maple leaf like hands.

"It's a contract marriage so we'll divorce 10 years later..."

The young master grabbed the note Aria was writing and ripped it to shreds.

"So where do I stamp it?"

"You told me you'll divorce me once we're older."

The young devil grew up and kissed her forehead.

"Since we have become adults, we have to instead make a contract for adults."

---
“If there is a next life, I will save you.”

Aria is the last remaining siren, a monster who bewitches humans with song. Shackled, she is forced to sing to nobles until she coughs blood. By the time the demonized Grand Duke Lloyd Valentine frees her, it’s too late. She has already breathed her last… or so she thinks. When she awakens in the past, Aria dedicates her life to protecting the duke, but she wonders if that’s really all her life is worth. Will she ever be free? Or is this siren destined to sing the same song forever?

---

description.fr:
Aria est la dernière des Sirènes, dont le chant ensorcelle les humains. Enfermée dans la cage de l'Empereur, elle doit chanter jusqu'à la mort. Lorsque le duc de Valentine, noble maudit et habité par un démon, lui propose de tuer toute la cour pour la libérer, Aria, déjà condamnée, accepte. Mais avant de rendre son dernier souffle, elle revient dans le passé, à l'année de ses dix ans. Saisissant cette nouvelle chance, elle va tout faire pour sauver le duc de la malédiction qui pèse sur lui...

description.id:
Setelah ibunya yang seorang siren meninggal, Aria menjadi burung yang terkurung dan harus bernyanyi untuk kaisar sampai mati. Di saat dia hampir mati, Lloyd, grand duke iblis datang dan membawa Aria keluar dari kandang burung. Saat itu Aria berpikir... "Kalau ada kehidupan selanjutnya, aku akan menolongmu." Ketika ia membuka mata, Aria kembali pada waktu di mana dia berusia 10 tahun. Saat itu dia berencana untuk melakukan pernikahan kontrak dengan Lloyd demi melindungi dirinya dan Lloyd.

description.it:
"Nella prossima vita, ti salverò". Aria è l'ultima sirena rimasta e, con il suo canto, incanta gli esseri umani. Rinchiusa ed incatenata, è costretta a cantare per i nobili fino al punto di tossire sangue. Quando il "demone" Granduca Lloyd la salva è ormai troppo tardi ed Aria esala l'ultimo respiro tra le sue braccia. Quando si risveglia, Aria si ritrova nel suo corpo di bambina di 10 anni. Decide così di prendere in mano la sua vita e di dedicarla alla protezione del Granduca, in segno di gratitudine per averla salvata. Ma Aria sarà mai davvero libera?

description.ko:
아리아는 계약 결혼을 제안했다.
그것도, 악마에게 영혼을 팔았다는 발렌타인의 대공자에게.
자신을 지키고, 그를 지키기 위해서.

[나와 결혼해.]

아리아는 단풍잎 같은 손으로, 쪽지와 함께 혼인 서약서를 내밀었다.

[계약 결혼이니까 10년 뒤에 이혼…….]

그러자 어린 대공자는 쓰고 있던 쪽지를 빼앗아 쫙쫙 찢으며 말했다.

“그래서, 도장은 어디에 찍으면 되지?”

“크면 이혼해주겠다고 했잖아.”

어느새 훌쩍 자란 악마 대공이, 그녀의 머리카락 위에 경건하게 입을 맞추며 말했다.

“어른이 되었으니 어른의 계약을 해야지.”

description.pt-br:
Sereias... um nome derivado de uma criatura antiga, usado para descrever aqueles que podem encantar, atrair, controlar e curar os outros cantando. Anos atrás, uma sereia chamada Sophia foi sequestrada pelo conde Cortez como sua preciosa sereia, e uma garota chamada Aria nasceu logo depois como sua filha. Sujeita a viver a vida de uma sereia, Aria experimentou, viu e ouviu muitas coisas horríveis. Outros fariam qualquer coisa para ouvi-la cantar, ao ponto da insanidade. O imperador, que ficou obcecado por ela, quebrou suas pernas e a trancou em uma gaiola dentro do palácio imperial para escondê-la e mantê-la para si mesmo. Despedaçada terrivelmente, Aria se resignou à morte, quando de repente - O Arquiduque Diabólico, Lloyd Cardenis Valentine, chegou e sussurrou: "Devo matar todos aqui? Se precisar de mim, é só me chamar. Sua música sempre me alcançará, onde quer que você esteja." No final, Aria chamou o diabo, levando a morte a todos os presentes, exceto ela mesma. "Vamos cair no inferno juntos." E com isso, Aria deu seu último suspiro e morreu... apenas para voltar a ser como era há 10 anos. Agora que ela tem uma segunda chance em sua vida, Aria está determinada a mudar seu destino, assim como o futuro cruel de seu salvador, o arquiduque Valentine. Ela lhe propõe um contrato de casamento, com o divórcio planejado 10 anos depois, mas ele tem outros planos...

---

description.en: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she’s always dreamed of! [Kodansha]
description.pt-br: Uma garota de 18 anos que perdeu sua família em um acidente, Yamano Mitsuha cai de um penhasco em um dia qualquer e é transportada para um mundo diferente com uma civilização ao nível da Europa Medieval. Mitsuha descobre que é possível ir e retornar à terra após uma luta mortal com lobos. Assim, ela decide viver em ambos os mundos. “Para ter segurança na velhice, eu vou mirar em alcançar 80.000 moedas de ouro!” “Tentarei não deixar coisas estranhas circularem para não distorcer o progresso do mundo, mas não vou me conter pelo bem da minha vida fácil e segura!” Enquanto usa três pistolas junto com palavras e ações que parecem decentes, em sua cabeça Yamano Mitsuha é uma garota esperta. Fazendo um esforço para ganhar dinheiro mesmo com um pequeno corpo que parece uma criança para os ocidentais!

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.fr:
En 1998, suite à la multiplication de surhumains appelés “choujin“, le monde a été divisé en provinces autonomes. Cinquante ans après, un crash aérien va changer à tout jamais le destin de la jeune Ely, cultivatrice de “tomeïto“, et impacter le paisible quotidien des lycéens Tokio Kurohara et Azuma Higashi, qui jouent aux justiciers face aux petits malfrats de quartier…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Glénat**
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...
description.es-la: Azuma Higashi es un chico bastante popular. Aunque puede ser algo pequeño, tiene fuertes habilidades de lucha y sus calificaciones son las mejores de su clase. Esto es lo opuesto a Tokio Kurohara, su amigo que no escucha en clase y es simplemente un espectador mientras Azuma pelea. No obstante, el vínculo de estos dos amigos de la infancia es fuerte, sin importar cuán diferentes sean. Los dos viven en la prefectura de Yamato, un distrito increíblemente ordinario con algunas áreas destruidas por Choujin. Los choujin son humanos con poderes sobrenaturales y peligrosos, a menudo la causa de la destrucción circundante. Mientras regresaban a casa, Tokio y Azuma se encuentran con un Choujin, que amenaza con matarlos. Sin posibilidad de escapar, Tokio y Azuma toman una decisión crucial: convertirse en Choujin. Con estos nuevos poderes adquiridos, Tokio ya no puede ser el espectador que alguna vez fue, ahora atrapado en un mundo donde la lucha es inevitable.

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

description.en:
"O, Hero!", with that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure -did not begin. After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?   
A revolutionary transferred-to-another-world administrative fantasy series starts here!
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.

altTitles.zh-hk: 請別告訴我這是三國正史！

title.en: Tensei Kenja no Isekai Life ~Daini no Shokugyou wo Ete, Sekai Saikyou ni Narimashita~

altTitles.en: My Isekai Life: I Gained a Second Character Class and Became the Strongest Sage in the World!

altTitles.ru: Жизнь перерождённого мудреца в другом мире. Получение второй профессии и становление сильнейшим

altTitles.ja: 転生賢者の異世界ライフ～第二の職業を得て、世界最強になりました～

altTitles.ko: 전생현자의 이세계 라이프 ~제2의 직업을 얻어 세계최강이 되었습니다~

altTitles.de: Mein Isekai-Leben – Mit der Hilfe von Schleimen zum mächtigsten Magier einer anderen Welt

altTitles.zh-hk: 轉生賢者的異世界生活~取得副職業併成為世界最強

altTitles.zh: 转生贤者的异世界生活〜取得副职业并成为世界最强

altTitles.fr: La vie d'un sage réincarné dans un autre monde : Obtenir une seconde profession et devenir le plus fort de ce monde

altTitles.en: Life as a Reincarnated Sage in Another World: Gaining a Second Profession and Becoming the Strongest in the World

description.en:
Sano Yuji, a black company employee, is summoned to another world while finishing his work at home. His profession in the other world, a Monster Tamer, is considered a job that makes it difficult to become an adventurer. However, thanks to some slimes he met, which read several magical books, he gained magical powers and the second profession, Sage.
Yuji acquired overwhelming power, but is he conscious of his strength? Blindly becoming unparalleled and strongest in the world!
description.fr:
Yuji Sano, employé d'une "entreprise noire", est invoqué vers un autre alors qu'il était en train de travailler chez lui.
Dans ce nouveau monde, il obtient la profession de "dresseur" de monstre, une profession qui rend le travail d'aventurier difficile. Cependant, grâce aux nombreux Slimes qu'il a dressés, il obtient une seconde profession, celle de "Sage", après qu'ils aient lu de nombreux livres magiques pour lui.  
Yuji a alors acquis un immense pouvoir dont il ne semble pas être conscient. Insoucieusement, il est en voie de devenir le plus puissant être de ce monde!
description.ja:
ブラック企業の社畜・佐野ユージはPC作業中に異世界に召喚! 異世界での彼の職業、それは『魔物使い(テイマー)』。冒険者になることも難しいとされる不遇職。
しかし、仲間にしたスライムのおかげで大量の魔導書を読み、様々な魔法の力を手にし、第二の職業『賢者』を手に入れる!
圧倒的な力を得たユージだが、自分の強さには無自覚で…?
最強の力で無自覚無双!「小説家になろう」発! 大人気異世界最強ファンタジーをコミカライズ!!
description.ru: Сотрудник «чёрной» компании Сано Юдзи оказался призван в другой мир как раз когда заканчивал свою работу дома. Там он получил профессию Укротитель монстров, считающуюся у местных неудобной для становления авантюристом. но благодаря знакомству со слизнями, которые прочитали несколько магических книг, он обрел магическую силу и вторую профессию — Мудрец. Вот так Юдзи встал на путь, который сделает его непревзойденным и сильнейшим в мире!

title.en: My Clumsy and Erotic Neighbor Sayuri-san

altTitles.ja: 不器用でエロい隣人さゆりさん

altTitles.es-la: Mi torpe y erótica vecina Sayuri-san

description.en: Series Follows Our Main Character and His Interactions With His Neighbor Sayuri-san.
description.ja: 高校生の主人公が、隣人の主婦である「さゆりさん」と様々なエロティックなシチュエーションを繰り広げるというストーリー。

altTitles.ja: カーストロマンス

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

altTitles.ja: まじっく快斗

altTitles.th: จอมโจรอัจฉริยะ

description.en: Teenage magician Kaito Kuroba has a secret identity: that of Kaitou Kid, a famous internationally-known and wanted "phantom thief". Kaito took the identity after one day discovering that his late father was the original Kaitou Kid. Later on, he discovers his father, who died from an 'accident' during a magic trick, was really murdered because he would not steal the jewel Pandora for an evil organization. As Kaitou Kid, Kaito tries to find Pandora before that organization that killed his father do, and destroy it, leading Inspector Nakamori and his taskforce on the wildest jewel heists imaginable!
description.ja: 世紀の宝物を予告通りに手中し、闇から闇へと消え去る紳士・怪盗キッド！！見事なマジックで名刑事らの裏をかき、目指すは「正義」の完全犯罪！！今宵、神出鬼没の彼が狙う宝石は、時価4億円の「月の瞳」だ！！

description.en: A fighter, a wizard and a misguiding spirit are on Nameless Isle-what happens next is the stuff of heroes - or not! It's up to them.

altTitles.en: Let's Have a Toast With Miso Soup!

altTitles.ja: 味噌汁でカンパイ！

description.en:
Zenichirou is a middle school student raised in a motherless family. His breakfast always consists of onigiri and instant miso soup from the convenience store. Yae, a childhood friend of Zenichirou, cannot stand to see him eat such an innutritious breakfast, so she decides to make him breakfast every morning…  
  
This story conveys a simple message: eating with another person makes miso soup taste more delicious and hearty!

The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

“You’ve manifested as a recessive Omega.”
No way…But I only came here to get a check up for a bad hangover?!
Overworked and overwhelmed with stress, Back-End Developer, Jinha, manifested as an Omega.
Jinha brews resentment for the leader of the Strategic Planning Team, Hyunjoon, and decides to open a savings account solely to save money to later hire a hitman.
But of course, bad luck comes in threes.
Now that his body is vulnerable to other’s pheromones, the only way to stabilize his body and its craving is with Hyunjoon’s refreshing pheromones.
But the only thing that Jinha can trust is Modern Medicine!
When seeking medical advice to somehow overcome his situation, the only prescription given to him as the safest method, is to have sex with someone that’s compatible and of the same gender.
Not only is Jinha feeling hopeless as he navigates through his hardship, but a stalker appears and attempts to shower him with his pheromones.
Finding himself with no other choice, Jinha asks Hyunjoon for help.

title.en: Party kara Tsuihou Sareta Sono Chiyushi, Jitsu wa Saikyou Nitsuki

altTitles.en: The Healer Who Was Banished From His Party, Is, in Fact, the Strongest

altTitles.ja: パーティーから追放されたその治癒師、実は最強につき

description.en:
A healer gets booted from his party because the leader notices he isn’t really contributing much to the team.

Soon enough, the healer must look for new members to party with. After finding a cute martial artist to work together with, he reveals his secret - while he’s a fairly mediocre healer, he actually fights well in close combat.

Anyway, here’s the story of a support who’s secretly a DPS, and where the entire conflict stems from the fact that he never told his old party he was DPS.
description.pt-br:
Um curandeiro é expulso de sua equipe porque o líder percebe que ele não está contribuindo muito para a equipe.  
O curandeiro deve procurar novos membros para formar uma equipe. Depois de encontrar uma linda artista marcial com quem quer trabalhar, ele revela seu segredo, embora seja um curandeiro medíocre, ele realmente luta bem no combate corpo a corpo.
De qualquer forma, aqui está a história de um suporte que é secretamente um DPS, e onde todo o conflito decorre do fato de que ele nunca disse a sua antiga equipe que era DPS.

altTitles.ja: PICK ME UP～低レア★英雄の成り上がり～
ピックミーアップ！低レア英雄の成り上がり

altTitles.ja-ro: Pick Me up!! Tei Rea Eiyū No Nariagari

description.en:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
description.pt-br:
No jogo de gacha mobile famoso por sua extrema dificuldade, o Mestre classificado em 5º lugar no mundo, "Loki" perde a consciência ao invadir a Masmorra.

"O quê? Eu sou um personagem de jogo agora?"

Depois de acordar, "Loki" percebe que ele se transformou em um Herói de Nível 1, 1 Estrela – 'Han Yslat'. Para retornar à Terra, ele deve liderar o Mestre e os heróis novatos e limpar o 100º andar da Masmorra!

"Você mexeu com o cara errado".

Esta é a história de transporte mais difícil  pelo Mestre Loki que nunca aceita uma única derrota.

altTitles.ja: リュウの道

description.en:
Ryu stows away on a space vessel, only to be found by the crew when it's far to late to return to earth. So they stick him in a spare sleep capsule instead. Things take a turn for the unexpected, however, when Ryu wakes up to find himself the sole survivor of the expedition, the spaceship having crash landed on a grossly mutated and wholly unfamiliar Earth. Joining forces with fellow survivors from a different crash, Ryu and his comrades fight to survive on this new and deadly Earth as they search for any humans that might've made it through the mysterious apocalypse.

The Second part of the Ryu Trilogy

altTitles.ja: ひとりぼっちはさみしくて

description.en: All she could ever think about was flying. Shio is a loner who has a secret dream locked up inside of her. However, she encounters a situation with the guy that will change her life forever.. and so the journey towards her dreams will slowly begin to unravel.
description.pt-br: Tudo que ela podia pensar era voar. Shio é uma garota solitária que tem um sonho secreto preso dentro de si. Ela enfrenta uma situação difícil, mas encontra o garoto que vai mudar sua vida para sempre... E então a jornada em direção aos seus sonhos vai lentamente começar a se desvendar.

title.en: Tenohira Kaitaku Mura de Isekai Kenkokuki: Fueteku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintou Life

altTitles.en: Country Building Story in Another World with the Pioneering Village in His Palm: Easy Life on the Uninhabited Island with His Ever Increasing Wives
Foundation of a State in Another World With a Hand-Built Colony Village: Carefree Life on an Uninhabitated Island With an Increasing Number of Brides

altTitles.ja: Tenohira Kaitakumura de Isekai Kenkouki: Fueteku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintou Raifu

altTitles.en: With Single Palm Founding a Pioneering Village a in Another World: Live With The Married Girls in Uninhabited Island Life

altTitles.ja: てのひら開拓村で異世界建国記〜増えてく嫁たちとのんびり無人島ライフ〜

altTitles.zh: 在掌中开拓村的异世界建国记

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenohira Kaitaku Mura de Isekai Kenkoku-ki: Fuete ku Yome-tachi to Nonbiri Mujintō Life

altTitles.zh-hk: 在掌中開拓村的異世界建國記

description.en:
Kai, a sickly kid, wished for a lively normal life on his deathbed when he was suddenly reincarnated into another world. Not only the boy’s wishes were fulfilled, he was also gifted an ability to be a god of his own little world at the back of his palm. Yet such bliss did not last long…  
  
Kai was abruptly separated from his loving adopted family and banished into an uninhabited island teeming with dangerous creatures. Using his ingenious wit and a help from a mysterious horned girl, Kai managed to survive and establish a small foothold with his army of cute stubby helpers.  
  
Watch as Kai tries to further tame this wilderness, building up his sanctuary and harem. Easy living!

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: Inaka no Kuro Gal JK to Kekkon Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 田舎の黒ギャルJKと結婚しました

altTitles.en: I Married a Tan Gal JK From the Countryside
I Married a Tan Gyaru High School Girl From the Countryside

altTitles.ja-ro: Inaka no Kuro Gal JK to Kekkon Shimashita

description.en:
Koichi quit his job and became a novelist. However, he could not think of any topic and was unable to write a novel.
One day, in order to concentrate on his novel, he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside, but there he meets Ichika, a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside.

She's sexually uninhibited and seems like she'll let you have sex right away, but she also has a strong desire to get married, and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika, and before he knows it, he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason, I ended up living with Ichika!!!?

And so begins the life of living together with a tan gal. 

When Ichika invites him to have sex with her in order to have a child, will Koichi be able to suppress his rationality and successfully complete his novel?

A slightly naughty marriage story about having a child.

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67452)
description.ja:
脱サラして小説家になった孝一。しかし、何も題材が思い浮かばず、小説が書けない毎日を過ごしていた。
そんなある日、小説に集中するために、祖父が所有するアトリエに住むために、ド田舎に引っ越すことに。何もない田舎に呆然する孝一だったが、そこで田舎に不釣り合いな黒ギャル女子高生・一花と出会う。

性に奔放ですぐにでもヤらせてくれそうな彼女、だけど結婚願望も強く、料理上手に人を立てるのも上手い。そんな一花に心惹かれた孝一は、いつしか彼女を自分の小説のヒロインにしたいと思い…。なぜか一花と同棲をすることになっていた!!!?

こうして始まる、黒ギャルとの同棲生活。子供を作るためにセック●に誘ってくる一花に、孝一は理性を抑え、小説を無事完成できるのか!?

これは、性に奔放な彼女と小説家が結婚して子供を作る、ちょっとHな結婚物語――。
description.pt-br:
Koichi largou o emprego e tornou-se autor de light novel. No entanto, ele não conseguia pensar em nenhum assunto e não conseguia escrever um romance. Um dia, para se concentrar no romance, ele decide se mudar para o campo para morar no ateliê de seu avô.

Koichi fica surpreso com o campo vazio, mas lá ele conhece Ichika, uma estudante bronzeada que está deslocada no campo. Ela é sexualmente desinibida e parece que vai deixar você fazer sexo imediatamente, mas também tem um forte desejo de se casar e é boa em cozinhar e administrar pessoas. Koichi se sente atraído por Ichika e, antes que perceba, quer fazer dela a heroína de seu próprio romance.

Por algum motivo acabei morando com Ichika!!!? E assim começa a vida de convivência com uma garota bronzeada. Quando Ichika o convida para fazer sexo com ela para ter um filho, Koichi será capaz de suprimir sua racionalidade e completar com sucesso seu romance? Uma história de casamento um pouco perversa sobre ter um filho. 

Obs: Baseado em um hentai feito pelo próprio autor.

description.en: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.en: Boku wa Kimitachi wo Shihai suru

altTitles.ja: 僕は君たちを支配する

altTitles.zh-hk: 我將要支配你們的一切

description.en:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
description.ru:
Семь женщин и один мужчина - захватывающая история о гареме!

Во время встречи выпускников школа неожиданно превратилась в замкнутое пространство. Крики и вопли ни к чему не привели. 26-летнему безработному Харуке Сато приходится выживать, сотрудничая с семью своими бывшими одноклассниками. Вскоре экстремальные условия начали разъедать их рассудок, и скрытые желания Харуки начали овладевать ими.

---

(Source: [mangalib](https://mangalib.me/boku-wa-kimitachi-wo-shihai-suru?section=info))
description.vi:
Bảy nữ, một nam, câu chuyện hậu cung hồi hộp!
Trong một buổi họp lớp, trường học bỗng nhiên bị một bức tường kỳ lạ bao quanh, không ai có thể thoát ra được. Haruka Sato 26 tuổi thất nghiệp phải sống sót bằng cách hợp tác với bảy người bạn học cũ của mình. Cuối cùng, hoàn cảnh khắc nghiệt bắt đầu ăn mòn tâm trí của họ, và dục vọng thầm kín của Haruka đã lộ ra nanh vuốt
description.es-la: ¡Siete mujeres, un hombre, una historia de harén llena de suspenso! Durante una reunión de ex-alumnos, la escuela se convirtió en una dimensión cerrada sin previo aviso. Los gritos y chillidos no trajeron respuesta. Haruka Sato, desempleado de 26 años, tiene que sobrevivir cooperando con siete de sus antiguas compañeras de clase. Pronto, las condiciones extremas comenzaron a devorar su cordura, y los deseos ocultos de Haruka comenzaron a afianzarse.

description.en: Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

title.en: Kimi Janakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

altTitles.ja: 君じゃなきゃダメな奴隷少女

altTitles.th: ทาสสาวของผมคนเดียวเท่านั้น

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi ja Nakya Dame na Dorei Shoujo

description.en: Daito's your average high-school kid. After getting home one day, he finds a strange girl sleeping on the floor—only to find out she's a slave from another world. He decides to take her in so she can start life anew as a normal girl, beginning their sweet-but-unusual life together as they navigate cultural barriers.
